```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#Import files
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("bp.R", local = knitr::knit_global())

#Variable Declaration
filepath = "./YearReport.csv"
PrimaryColor = "#004D9A"
SecundaryColor = "#002142"
TertiaryColor = "#0069D2"
QuaternaryColor = "#0180FF"
QuinaryColor = "#4FA7FF"
```

## File Check
```{r file_import, echo=FALSE}
file_exists <- file.exists(filepath)
if(file_exists){
print("File succesful imported")
}
if(!file_exists){
print("File not found")
}
print(file_exists)
```


## Scatter Plot
```{r scatter, echo=FALSE}
scatter(filepath, "Year","Quota", PrimaryColor)
```

## Line Plot
```{r line, echo=FALSE}
line(filepath, "Year","Quota", PrimaryColor, SecundaryColor)
```

## Horizontal Bar Plot
```{r horbar, echo=FALSE}
bar(filepath, "Year","Quota",TRUE, FALSE, PrimaryColor)
```

## Vertical Bar Plot
```{r verbar, echo=FALSE}
bar(filepath, "Year","Quota",FALSE, FALSE, PrimaryColor)
```
